animeTitle: Kensaku to Enjin no Atarashii Tomodachi: Query Toujou!
animeDescription: Yahoo!'s Kensaku to Enjin franchise gained a new character: Query. She wants to be an idol, loves fashion, and gets quite the motor mouth when angry. This short 2D animation debuts her on stage.
animeRelated: ['Parent story: Kensaku to Enjin no ABC Days']
